description:
I colorized, restored and created a sound design for this video of Niagara Falls Ontario, Canada 1920s, we can see a complete view of the place and the people who enjoy it. 

Video Restoration Process:
✔ FPS boosted to 60 frames per second 
✔ Image resolution boosted up to HD 
✔ Improved video sharpness and brightness 
✔ Colorized only for the ambiance (not historically accurate)
✔added sound only for the ambiance
✔restoration:(stabilisation,denoise,cleand,deblur) 

Please, be aware that colorization colors are not real and fake, colorization was made only for the ambiance and do not represent real historical data.

B&W Video Source: A/V Geeks
B&W Video Source: https://archive.org/details/oaniagarafalls


Great thanks to Skip Elsheimer (A/V Geeks) for share the amazing black and white Video Source

Support A/V Geeks on https://ko-fi.com/avgeeks

Join this channel to benefit from exclusive advantages and also to support us: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC1W8ShdwtfgjRHdbl1Lct
title: 1920s - Niagara Falls Ontario, Canada in color [60fps,Remastered] w/sound design added
